page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE IN HASTINGS
page.content: There are many different life styles, but for a working family each morning is busy. Most schools and industry start between 8 and 9, so the day starts about about 7. The family will meet again in the evening when probably the main meal will take place. Entertainment may be watching television or videos. Others may go out to a pub or a club. The family will relax more on the weekend. Shopping, gardening, painting or sport will take up time. Saturday night is the busiest night in the town centre. Religion is still important on Sunday but more and more entertainment and trade is opening.
